snippet: Russia's economy will eke out growth this year but shrink in 2015 as a slump in oil prices and Western sanctions imposed over Moscow's role in the Ukraine crisis drag on activity, a Reuters poll showed on Friday....

headline.print_headline: Russian Economy to Contract in 2015 as Woes Mount-Reuters Poll
headline.main: Russian Economy to Contract in 2015 as Woes Mount-Reuters Poll

lead_paragraph: Russia's economy will eke out growth this year but shrink in 2015 as a slump in oil prices and Western sanctions imposed over Moscow's role in the Ukraine crisis drag on activity, a Reuters poll showed on Friday.
